entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of snow or rain this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
